So, Mark decided that a basic introduction was the best start and he spoke tentatively, "Hello there. My name is Mark." He didn't know who was more surprised when spoke because the giantess jerked her head back, her eyes widening in shock. There was a moment of stunned silence before the giantess yanked Mark closer and examined him from head to toe. He fidgeted in her grip, becoming embarrassed under her piercing gaze as she took in every detail of his body, before slowly unclenching the hand that held him.

She twisted her palm as she slowly opened her trembling hand, giving a platform for Mark to stand up on. He noted how soft her palm was when he carefully stood up on her trembling hand and stared up at the awed face of his captress.

She was the first one to speak, "What are you?" she whispered slowly. Her warm breath washed over him again, smelling of pine and mint. He bowed this time to the giantess, wanting to make a good impression and repeated his introduction, "Hello there. My name is Mark."

The giantess's face made an "aaahhh" expression and she hurriedly introduce herself, "Ah, hellooo, My c-cccllan nammmme isss Hunts Alone. May-ay theeee Great Spirit watcccchhh over usss." She stuttered, clearly not use to introducing herself to a shrinky.

Mark kept his cool though as he asked the first question on his mind, "Nice to meet you Hunts Alone. I wonder if you can tell where I am right now." That drew a blank look from Hunts Alone as she seemed to have trouble answering. She mumbled "The ancestral land," but Mark had no idea where the "Ancestral Land" was, but saved Hunts Alone from answering.

"Nevermind, I was just wondering." He said, but he was happy to know that he was still in North America from her language.

Hunts Alone heaved a sigh of relief then asked a barrage of questions of her own. What tribe are you from? How did you get so tiny? Did the Great Spirit curse you? What are you? Each question brought her face closer and closer to Mark till her breath knocked him on his ass before Hunts Alone realized she was way too close.

She turned her head away, embarrassment turning her tan skin scarlet. Mark couldn't help but chuckle at her reaction and felt that this woman could help him with his problems. He spoke up, "I don't think you have the answers to my questions, but to you know anyone that does?" That perked Hunts Alone right up as someone came to mind and she squealed, "The Wise-Woman will know. The Great Spirit speaks to her about all things."

"Can you take me to her?" Mark asked.
"Yes, I was on my way back to the village when I spotted you." Hunts Alone was trembling with excitement now. "I'd never thought I would find something so amazing."

She must have some amazing eyes to see me amongst the grass, he thought. Mark walked carefully to ledge of her hand and look down see the grass he'd been sitting on hundreds of feet below. He jerked back away from the edge, feeling vertigo but realizing Hunts Alone didn't just have amazing eyesight, but amazing height as well because she was over 7 feet tall. The aforementioned giantess, had already started skipping back towards the village and Mark had to latch onto her finger to keep from being thrown.

Hunts Alone must have realized this because stop immediately and raised Mark up to her plump lips. "Sorry about that. This should be more comfortable." She pulled him away long enough for Mark to a proper look at her attire or lack of. Her clothes resembled the clothing Indians were such as moccasin boots, a short skirt and belt with stuffed sacks and sheathed knives hanging from her waist, and only broad band, similar to a oversized scarf, wrapped around her oversized breasts.

Hunts Alone carefully placed Mark in her massive cleavage and gave her breasts a few knocks to see if he was comfortable. The firm jugs shook erotically around him but Mark was very, very, comfortable in his position. She smiled seeing the shocked, then almost serene expression on his face before she said "Hold on" and took off sprinting.

The world became a violent roller-coaster of breasts as Mark was plunged down, then shot up as Hunts Alone's breasts shook violently within the confines of her breastband as she quickly covered ground back towards her village. The ride was both pleasurable as her firm breasts rubbed him in all the right places and vomit-inducing as his stomach couldn't decide whether to stay in his feet or ride up his throat.

After a couple of minutes, a village was coming in sight and Hunts Alone was starting to slow down, barely winded from the long sprint. Her run became a jog, then a walk as she entered the outskirts of the village and Mark got his first look at it. It was seriously an Indian village as scantily clad women strolled unembarrassed through the maze of erect teepees. All of the women wore garbs similar to Hunts Alone, but to varying degrees of covering as some didn't even bother to wear anything at all and Mark stared at them till Hunts Alone strode pass. Not to mention that each woman was just as tall, if not taller than Hunts Alone, even some of the children were taller than Mark at his normal full height. Mark didn't see any male villagers though, even as they drew closer the largest teepee in the middle of the village.

Pink-colored smoke rose through the top as Hunts Alone approach the pair of guardswomen in front of the entrance. Hunts Alone's voice vibrated through her chest as she wished to speak with the Wise-Woman. The guards allowed her entry and entered the dark, humid teepee fearlessly.

Mark coughed as the pink smoke rolled over him, smelling of incense and bubblegum. It took his eyes a moment to adapt to the low-light to see an age woman in white garb sitting silently by the fire producing the smoke. Her face was lined with old-age but Mark could see traces of the beautiful woman the elder must have been. Hunts Alone approached then bowed to the elder, nearly toppling Mark out of her cleavage.

"Elder, I have come to seek your wisdom as I have found a strange sight that I have never seen before." Hunts Alone spoke in respectful tone as the elder turned towards her.

"Bah, you reckless girl. You are allows bringing things that you find interesting, no different than your mother or her mother before her." The Wise-Woman complained. Though it sounded like she was scolding Hunts Alone, Mark saw a soft smile on her lips.

"So girl, what have you brought this time?" the Wise-Woman asked.

"Something that was never spoken of in your stories." Hunts Alone approached the elder and carefully pulled Mark out cleavage. She dropped him in her palm and Mark stood up as the Wise-Woman brought her face closer. Her eyes bugged out the moment she laid her eyes on Mark and she jerked back muttering, "A male. A male has returned to the world." Hunts Alone immediately grew worried, but the Wise-Woman waved her away as she muttered and spoken herself. Mark could only watch as the Wise-Woman slowly regained her composure before pointing to a cushion for Hunts Alone to sit on. She sat on the cushion and set Mark down on top her expansive chest as the Wise-Woman sat across from them.

"Hunts Alone." Hunts Alone stiffened up at the call. "Do you know the significance of what you have brought to me?" Hunts Alone slowly shook her head as the Wise-Woman sighed. "The person on your chest, is something that our great-ancestors used to called a male. They are like in form, but very different fundamentally." Hunts Alone stole a quick glance at Mark before nodding at the elder's words. "There used to be as many males as their were Amazons in the world and they lived side by side with our ancestors as the plotted and survived on the land we live on today. But something happened centuries ago that killed off most of the men but the few that remained called for the benevolence of the Great Spirit not to save themselves but to save us and allow to continue on with children. The Great Spirit had granted their plea, but the price was the few remaining males disappeared in exchange for saving us."

Hunts Alone gasped as Mark stared flabbergasted at what the elder was saying. That shouldn't be right he thought, there was nothing in history books about any of this. Then an almost incomprehensible idea came to his mind, but he didn't want to believe it. Looking down at his left hand, the portal device was still there but everything else had changed. He realized that he wasn't on Earth anymore. He was trapped in unknown world.

The elder continued, "So the one you have brought here, though tiny, is one of the last remaining males in this world." The Wise-Woman stood up and approached Mark, who was too in shock to notice. The elder kneeled to him and said, "At long last, the Great Spirit has returned the males to this world."

This would be the start of Mark's adventure into the world of Amazons.
14111.title: Introductions

choices: Someone Comes in the Middle of the Night
141111.content:
(Ran out of room in the previous chapter)

Mark was in a daze as the Wise-Woman kneeled before him like he was some sort of messiah that came to save them. He looked up to see Hunts Alone's reaction, which showed she just as shocked as he was in this situation. She stared wide-eyed at the kneeling Wise-Woman, who's the highest authority in the village, was bowing her head to someone the size of ant. Mark couldn't understand what going on, but he didn't want an elder bowing to him as it just felt wrong.

"Wait. Wait. Wait. I'm not someone that the Great Spirit or whatever it is sent here. I just got lost when I was....ummm... traveling and I ended like this completely by accident." He was mentally slapping himself for this vague explanation, but it got the Wise-Woman's attention. The elder raised her head, curiosity written over her face. Mark sighed, "How about I explain how I ended up here and we go from there." The Wise-Woman nodded in agreement and thankfully wasn't kneeling anymore as she sat back down on the cushion.

"Now where should I begin." Mark explained the circumstances that caused him to arrive in this world, omitting the parts that they wouldn't understand such as the portal device in his left hand and the parts that he couldn't understand himself. The elder and Hunts Alone listened in rapt attention as Mark explained, only stopping to answer their questions every now and then as he gave them his story. The sunlight was already fading by the time he finished his story and the dark teepee was now almost pitch-black.

The Wise-Woman sighed after he'd finish, she had been listening and trying to understand the vague circumstance he had given that brought them here. Mark looked up to see Hunts Alone's expression, but the deepening gloom hid her features from him. He heard the Wise-Woman getting up as her robes shuffled against the floor and she threw more wood into the fading fire. The branches crackled as the fire reignited, casting a bright orange glow inside the teepee and allowing Mark to see again

The expression on the Wise-Woman's face was tired, but a small smile still shown on her lips. She finally spoke after a few moments contemplating, "Your story was one that I have never heard before, but it does not change that you are here right now. The Great Spirit must have brought you here for a reason, but I cannot understand why yet. I cannot think of anyway to help you return home as you yourself don't know where your homeland is, but I will let you stay in the village for the time being. Though I must ask that you stay with one of our villagers."

Mark understood what she was implying. He was a stranger in a foreign land, stuck at a tiny size and she was offering shelter, but she wanted someone to keep an eye on him in exchange. He shrugged, it wasn't like that he would make it far out even if he got the portal device in his hand to work. Mark bowed and said, "I kindly accept your offer of hospitality and agree to your terms, but I would like to ask you a few question if you don't mind."

The Wise-Woman didn't mind and Mark asked the following questions. 1) Where was he? Answer: He was on the Horse clans ancestral land with grassland stretching out for hundreds of miles in any direction with a couple of small mountains interspaced that provided water to the roaming tribe. 2) What are your people like? Answer: Every woman in the village and beyond it is called an Amazon. They each have tasks that their families work together on to provide for the tribe as a whole such as hunting, weaving, and building. And lastly 3) What are they going to do from now on?

"For now, I will consult with the spirits to understand what is going on and you......Hunts Alone." She called and Hunts Alone jumped at the sudden call. Mark lost his balance when she suddenly jumped and fell down into her cleavage. He struggled to get out as the Wise-Woman told Hunts Alone, "As part of our law, you were the one to discover and bring him here, so you are the one solely to bear responsibility for everything. Do you understand?"

Hunts Alone nodded and pulled the struggling Mark out of her cleavage. The Wise-Woman nodded satisfied and told Mark, "You will be staying with Hunts Alone for now on as she was the one to find you." Mark nodded and the Wise-Woman turned to leave but stopped. She came back and asked, "You told us much about yourself but you have yet to introduce yourself." Mark facepalmed mentally then introduced himself. The Wise-Woman went hhmmmm, then spoke in a tone of voice that brook no argument. "As a guest of this clan, I deem you the name "Marksman" as your clan name and you shall be known by that so long as you stay within the clan."

Mark wanted to rise in protest but the elder was already shooing Hunts Alone and him out of the teepee. Hunts Alone stumbled outside, keeping Mark safe in her cleavage as the flap closed shut behind them. The guards had questioning looks, but Hunts Alone ignored them and strode off into the maze of teepees. Mark kept quiet as he took in the sight of the villagers again as they were laughing and working together in the firelight. Hunts Alone approached a teepee that was somewhat separated from the rest and she entered without pretense.

Mark stared at wall (is it canvas?) to wall hunting trophies hanging around the teepee. Hunts Alone had trophies from many animals that Mark recognized, but quite a few were completely foreign to him. A fur bed was stuffed in one section of the teepee as Hunts Alone dropped onto it and laid there silently. Mark slowly crawled out her cleavage and asked in a small voice, "Are you alright?"

Hunts Alone let out a long sigh then looked down to stare at the little man leaning against her massive chest. "It's nothing. I was just wondering how everything that I thought I knew about our ancestor's history was lacking when I found out about you." She sighed again and sat up, watching as Mark rolled down her body from the sudden incline. He landed on the short skirt covering her crotch and he stood annoyed at the sudden role. But his annoyance vanished when he thought about what the Wise-Woman had told Hunts Alone.

"What did the Wise-Woman mean when she said that you would have to bear all of the responsibility?" Mark asked.
"She meant that you are my responsibility and that anything you do; good or bad reflects upon me as I am your keeper." Hunts Alone explained.
"So what would happen if I did something bad?"
"The villagers would blame me for your deeds and I would be punished severely as they wouldn't think of harming a guest."

Mark couldn't believe that she was taking such a risk for him and he vowed to himself that he wouldn't do anything to cause trouble for Hunts Alone. "I promise you that I won't do any such thing." Hunts Alone smiled and giggled, making Mark feel silly but he was happy to see Hunts Alone back to normal. "Hunts Alone. I was wondering if you can answer some of my questions."

"I'll try but I can't promise much though Marksman." She giggled.

Mark and Hunt Alone chatted for a good while before Hunts Alone mentioned that they needed to sleep. She had told Mark earlier why she was called Hunts Alone was because she always hunted alone and clan names were based on what the individual was most noted for. She made a bed for Mark out of a bowl with a couple of warm pelts stuff in, giving him a warm, furry bed.

"Goodnight Marksman." Hunts Alone whispered and extinguished the candle.
"Goodnight Hunts Alone." He said.

................

Mark waited for an hour to make sure that Hunts Alone was asleep before he crawled out of his "bed" and went to a secluded corner of the teepee. He didn't want Hunts Alone or the Wise-Woman to see what he was about to do.

Looking down at the device he stretched out his left hand and concentrated. Slowly, ever so slowly, a spiraling rift began to appear at the end of his hand. Mark remember that a portal opened during his fall, thus saving his life but he wondered how it happened. All he remember was thinking "get me away from the ground" then a portal opened up, shooting him away. So now he was thinking, "take me to the grassland" and a portal was responding to it. Looking through, he saw that it was the same spot he had fallen on and he pulled himself back into Hunts Alone teepee. Mark now had a vague idea of how the device works now. The device, after having fused with his left palm, only responded to his will when he had a clear goal that the device can understand.

He tested the device by making portals of various sizes but none them, even the ones made to grow him into a giant, allowed him grow back to his original size. "Great, I'm stuck here as tiny till I can fix this thing." He grumbled, then a sense of fatigue assaulted his body and he barely made it back to his bed before he was fast asleep.
141111.title: Introductions Pt.2

choices: He wakes up in the Wise-Woman's tent
1411111.content:
Mark awoke to the sound of Hunts Alone trying to move quietly about the teepee for your sake, but every little sound she made sounded like bombs were going off to your ears. He rose out of bed, blurry-eyed, while yawning loudly and rubbing the sleep out of his eyes. The sun had just risen as rays scarlet lit the teepee with a warm glow. Mark turned his head to see Hunts Alone digging into one of the sacks lying on the wall, then he did a double take as his jaw dropped to the floor.

Hunts Alone was as naked as the day she came into the world and Mark couldn't tear his eyes away from the juicy spectacle before his eyes. Her copper skin was flawless as not a single blemish could be seen. Her large ass jiggled side to side seductively as she rummaged through the sack not finding what she was looking. When she turned towards another sack, her humongous breasts bounced freely from being released from the restraining breastband and shook erotically with every motion. Mark thought they would sag without any support but the huge melons firmly defied gravity and jutted out when she straightened up.

Mark felt his heart racing as he watched entranced at the beautiful woman that he was living together with. He didn't know what the do as she continued, unaware of her audience watching the show. He felt his member pitching a tent down below but he refused to let himself be distracted from the nude giantess right in front of him.

After awhile Hunts Alone found what she was looking for and pulled out an outfit similar to the one she wore yesterday. Mark watched as Hunts Alone struggled to get her underwear over her butt and hips, hopping a little to pull them up. She had to manhandle her huge breasts into the tight confines of her breastband and she barely succeeded in restraining them. She pulled her hair back into a ponytail and fixed it with a leather band. Only when she was finished did she turn around and froze when she saw Mark staring at her.

Hunts Alone's face turned scarlet as she blushed and turned her face away. "Uh Marksman, could you stop so hard staring. It's embarrassing."

Mark snapped out of it and his own face turned red, but with shame. He felt Hunts Alone come closer and gently wrapped her hand around his miniscule body. She perched him on her shoulder, giving Mark a great view of her cleavage that had his pants bulging. Hunts Alone noticed this small detail and muttered, "What's this?"

Mark couldn't react fast enough to stop her finger as it came and rubbed his aching member. Mark shivered from the rubbing but he managed to push Hunts Alone's finger away before he blew. She had a queer look on her face like she did something wrong. "Sorry Hunts Alone but where I come from it's not right to touch there."

Hunts Alone raised an eyebrow, then said something horrifying, "I don't see why it's wrong to touch it. We Amazons get those every month for about a week."

Mark became petrified at what Hunts Alone said so casually and his brain couldn't process what the hell she was talking about. He just barely stuttered, "Yoooouu geee-ggeet thee-eem evveery mmmonntth?!?!"

"Yes, every once a month we Amazon start feeling.... "manly" as the ancestors had called it. They just suddenly pop out when we're asleep and we just get the urge to fuck the nearest person." Hunts Alone said straight-faced.

"Don't tell me this was the blessing the Great Spirit left your after the men disappeared." Mark remembered the story and prayed that this wasn't it but Hunts Alone blew that fragile hope away as she smiled and said "Yep."

Mark instantly became depressed at the mental image of a she-male Amazon and asked in a deadpanned voice, "Do you ever feel "manly"?"
"Sometimes. But I haven't been overcome with the urge yet." Hunts Alone smiled, a complete contrast to the downcast Mark.

"How about I show around the village. That should at least cheer you up." Hunts Alone suggested. Mark only replied with "sure" and the two set into waking dawn of the village.

..................

Mark surprised at the amount of villagers moving about even though it was the crack of dawn, but he saw Amazons already to work with their craft. Some of the villagers waved at Hunts Alone then went back to their work, but none of them seem to notice Mark sitting on Hunts Alone's shoulder. Well, he was fine with that as they get swamped with the villagers trying to get their hands on him. He noticed one the nude villagers, she was as gorgeous as Hunts Alone but when Mark's eyes saw her groin, he wished he could unseen the giant dick swinging from her crotch.

Mark ripped his eyes from the sight, but the image was burned into his memory and he would be having nightmares over it. Hunts Alone asked if he was alright and he replied "I saw something I can never unsee." Hunts Alone had question marks flying from her head at his reply.

Skipping over that traumatic scene, Hunts Alone showed him the medicine tent, the armory, and the makeshift stables that could quickly be broken down when the camp moved out. Mark was starting to enjoy himself as he listened to Hunts Alone animatedly describe everything in the village and was happy to see her so excited over her village.

Suddenly horns sounded and the village became quiet as the horns blew a sequence that had the villagers scrambling. Hunts Alone immediately jumped into action and Mark grabbed onto a wayward lock of dark hair to avoid being thrown. "What's happening?" he yelled into Hunts Alone's ear and she only said, "A raid," then sprinted towards the armory. Mark heard something thundering over the screams of villagers and suddenly cloaked riders came roaring into the village on huge horses.

These things were the size of bears and just as mean as the tried to trample the villagers. Hunts Alone was heading straight for one these riders and performed an acrobatic flip right onto the horse. The rider twisted around to stab her with a dagger but she easily disarmed and knocked the rider off the saddle. The horse now riderless, screamed and took off running. The rider jumped back to her feet and engaged Hunts Alone in a deadly dance as both sides struck and defended simultaneously. Mark held on for dear life as he watched both of them fight to the death. He saw the rider's fist coming from Hunts Alone's blind spot and the momentary distraction would be enough for the rider to get a killing blow.

"Like hell." Mark roared and opened a portal that absorbed the blow. The rider's eyes widened in surprise before her own fist came out of the exit portal and slammed into her own stomach. She crumpled from the sudden, unexpected blow and Hunts Alone's own fist nailed her in the temple, knocking her out cold. The rider fell, but it wasn't over as other riders raided the village. Before Mark could think about what to do next, Hunts Alone grabbed him off her shoulder and buried him in cleavage. "You'll be safer there." she said briefly, then whispered, "Thank you."

She immediately ran towards another raider and Mark only got glimpses of other villagers fending off the attackers. They were doing quite well until he heard a whistling noise and Hunts Alone sudden scream. She fell, knocking Mark out of her cleavage and he rolled to his feet to see an arrow sticking out of her calf. He saw riders with long bows sniping the defenders while they were distracted and they were picking them off one by one. Hunts Alone moaned in agony as another arrow was coming straight for her head. Mark yelled for her to get out of the way, but she wouldn't make as the arrow was almost on top of her.

The world suddenly slowed down around Mark as his brain kicked into overdrive and he realized everything that was happening. Hunts Alone was going to die, the village would be ransack, and his fate would become undetermined. Was he okay with that? Would just stand there as an incompetent tiny? No. No way in hell would he let those things happen. Rage, hot and thick, thrummed through his veins as he roared.

Suddenly all the flying arrows disappeared in midair, only reappear targeting the archers that shoot them. They screamed as they were shot with their own arrows. Raiders fighting on the ground suddenly lost their footing as portals opened beneath their feet. They lost their balance and became easy opponents for the villagers. Weapons such spears, axes, and knives appeared in mid-air, plummeting towards the raiders and injuring them when the landed. The raiders couldn't understand what was going as holes appeared in the air and shoot weapons at all the invaders. Spear-points suddenly bypassed distances, fists were redirected, and anything thrown at the villagers were shot back. Mark commanded all these things to happen as the portal device became a mere extension of his will.

The raiders sounded a retreat and all the ones left standing grabbed their wounded clanswomen then fled. Villagers cheered as the raiders ran with there tails stuck between their legs.

Mark was sweating and heaving great gulps of air, as if he been fighting just as hard as the Amazons, but he had never moved from his position on the ground. Hunts Alone stared at him with a mixture of shock and fear as she realized he was the one creating the holes in the air.

Mark saw her shocked expression and rage he felt dissipated in an instant, only to be replaced with an indescribable fear. He took an unsteady step towards her, she recoiled and he tried to explain. "Hunts Alone, I--" He never finished as he black out and fell down, lastly seeing the fearful expression on Hunts Alone's face.

He wanted say "I'm not a monster." before the darkness took over and he fell unconscious.
1411111.title: The Raiders

14111111.content:
Mark awoke feeling like the dead and opened his blurry eyes to see that he was lying on an oversized bed in the Wise-Woman's teepee. He groaned, his throat feeling like someone had ran sandpaper down it and he rubbed his throbbing head. He realized it wasn't just his head that was hurting, as his whole body was aching something fierce and it looked exactly the way he felt.

His body had turned into nothing but skin and bones almost like he had the life sucked right out of him. He stared at his left palm, the device had remained the only thing that didn't seem affected by his poor condition. Mark fidgeted and tried to sit up but agony ripped through his body and he collapsed back on his bed withering in pain.

The pain subsided after a few agonizing moment and Mark gave up sitting up for now, so he let his eyes wonder about the teepee. A warm fire crackled softly in the middle of the teepee, but he was too far away to feel the heat, but a warm wind blowing in from his right kept him warm, but it smelt familiar for some reason. His view was obscured somewhat by a pile of black silk on his right side and Mark rubbed the soft silk between his fingers. Beyond that was just a wall of fur that ran from the end of the bed back to the pile of silk.

Mark sighed, already bored at being bedridden and starting thinking over his body deteriorated condition. There was no way possible for his body to suddenly deteriorated like this as he had been well-fed and drank plenty of water. So what could've happened?

His thoughts came back to the watch. It was the only thing that had changed both his circumstance and apparently himself too. The device responded to his thoughts yesterday and the night before, yet the battery should still be in the device. Wait.....Mark suddenly thought of the fatigue he felt when he experimented with the device, then how he collapsed after the raid.

"No way." Mark suddenly understood what was going on. It wasn't that his body had deteriorated rapidly but rather that it was drained to fuel the device. When the device fused with his palm, it must have turned his body into the power source as that was the only thing that could turn cause him to look like a zombie from over using it during the raid.

"The raid. THE RAID." Mark jumped up, ignoring the searing pain as he remembered Hunts Alone being wounded during the raid and fearful expression on her face. Though he forced his body to stand up through sheer willpower, his body collapsed again when he tried to take his first step. Mark felt frustrated and tried to crawl off the bed but a annoyed voice interrupted him.

"Here I leave for just a few moments and my patient is already trying to kill himself again."

Mark twisted to see the Wise-Woman reappearing seemingly out of nowhere and came strutting towards the bed. She clicked her tongue and carefully transferred Mark back where he had crawled from. "Stay there." she commanded and when she was satisfied that he would obey did she turn her back to grab a cushion. She positioned the cushion so that Mark could talk with her without any issues.

The Wise-Woman held up her hand before Mark could open his mouth and grabbed a bowl from nearby. She filled it with a couple of drops of water then pulled out a knife. Mark reeled back, but she only dipped it in the water and balanced a droplet on the end. She carefully brought the knife-point above Mark then twisted it, dropping the droplet. Mark caught it, then gracelessly slurped as it helped clear his parched throat. The Wise-Woman repeated this a couple of times till Mark was able to talk in raspy voice.

"What happened to Hunts Alone?" Mark blurted after getting his fill. Instead of answering, she only chuckled and pointed behind him, "Look for yourself."

Mark looked back to only see the pile of black silk and gave the Wise-Woman a queer look that she chuckled at. Reaching over him, she parted the silk.....no, hair and the peaceful sleeping face of Hunts Alone was revealed. Mark realized that the wall of fur was only a blanket covering her and the warm wind was her breath.

He turned back to the smiling face of the Wise-Woman and asked, "Is she alright?"

The Wise-Woman nodded and said, "The wound was a minor flesh wound and she'll be fine in a fortnight." Mark heaved a sigh of relief at her words then her face turned serious.

"Marksman." She said. Mark stiffened at the commanding tone of her voice. "I know that you were the one that created the holes in the sky and earth. And I know that you were hiding this from us during our first meeting here." Her eyes narrowed as she drew closer. "I do not know why you didn't reveal this but I am asking you to be honest now and any lies will be punished."

Mark gulped, now scared of the Amazon but he tried to explain in layman's terms on how he was able to open the portals. The Wise-Woman listened without comment until he finished explaining. She sighed heavily when he finished and he waited in cold sweat for a tense few minutes before she spoke.

"I can not began to understand the gift that the Great Spirit has left you, but you saved my family from the raiders and I won't reward such a deed with disgrace." She bowed to Mark, "Marksman. As chief of this tribe, I thank you for saving my clan from the bottom of my heart. They are irreplaceable to me and you unselfishly saved their lives. How can I repay you."

Mark suddenly grew bashful and embarrassed at her kind words, but he felt that he didn't deserve such praise as he had only lashed out in anger at the ones who were trying to kill Hunts Alone. He then remembered the expression of fear that Hunts Alone had when he used his ability and he wanted to leave right at that moment.

"Listen." he spoke, "I don't deserve such praise. I.....I only attacked them out of anger, okay. I didn't use my power to do something noble like protecting the village, rather I was just enraged at raiders for hurting Hunts Alone and I snapped. I don't deserve yours or the villagers respect for what I did and Hunts Alone must think I'm a freak after watching me do all of that." Mark felt shame well up hot and bitter as he remembered the rage he felt and the haunting look on Hunts Alone's face.

"My dear child. I believe that you have it wrong." The Wise-Woman said kindly.
"How could I have it wrong. You didn't see the look on her face when I collapsed." Mark retorted.
"No, but you weren't awake for what happened next."
"What happened next?"

The Wise-Woman started to recount what had happened, "I believe you on how Hunts Alone reacted, but wouldn't you have react like that if you were like that?" Mark couldn't reply to that immediately. Sure, portals were amazing but it was the norm in his old world so hadn't he hadn't thought about what it would be like for someone whose never seen a portal. "I couldn't say for sure," he mumbled. The Wise-Woman nodded, then continued; "After you had collapsed, Hunts Alone, that reckless girl, ignored her own injury and came rushing here with you for healing. You suddenly had started shriveling before our eyes as your gift started taking its toll on you. I had commanded Hunts Alone to see a healer herself, but she refused to leave your side."

Mark's jaw hung open in surprise. "Why would she do that? I thought that she wouldn't have anything to do with me after that," he murmured. The Wise-Woman shook her head and asked, "Marksman. Did she ever tell you how she got her name?"

Mark nodded and repeated that she liked to hunt alone but he then felt like a dumbass the moment it left his mouth. The elder woman shook her head and told him, "That young Amazon hunts alone because everybody is afraid of hunting with her ."

"Why?"
"Because she's too passionate. Every time she went out hunting with the others, she would often go after the more dangerous beasts because one of the villagers needed a part of the beast and Hunts Alone jumped at every chance to help the village. She would go anywhere and do anything for us, but that passion is what drove the others away as they viewed her as a reckless fool. She continued on hunting, becoming more and more isolated as the other left feeling that her passion will get them killed. She is a wonderful granddaughter to me, but one I constantly worry about as she has nobody to be with her." The elder sighed. "She's been alone for long time as the other clanswomen grew afraid of her reckless skill. When she brought you here, I thought you were another trinket she took a liking to but it turned out that you were something a lot more meaningful."

Question marks were flying around Mark's head as the Wise-Woman continued, "Marksman. If she was scared of you as you said, then why did she rush to get you help?" Mark couldn't find an answer. "It's because you were a friend to her. You were not afraid of her like the others and you had risked your life to save her. She refused to leave you alone and is now staying by your side. She trusts you Marksman."

The Elder bowed again, "What you did for her was engraved into her heart, so I ask that you stay with her in the village."

Mark didn't know how to answer right away but he turned to watch Hunts Alone's peaceful, dreamy expression and he didn't want to betray the feelings of the Amazon behind him.

He turned back to the Wise-Woman to see her waiting for his answer. Mark could only smile, and said "Wise-Woman, after everything you told me, how could I call myself a man if I turned my back on Hunts Alone. I swear that I will stay with her in village, but I cannot guarantee that it will be forever."

The Wise-Woman only smiled. "Thank you Marksman," she spoke in a soft whisper. "Now then," She said back to business, "You need to rest as you are still recovering like Hunts Alone." After that she tuck him into bed and he fell into a dreamless sleep.
14111111.title: Hunts Alone

141111111.content:
Mark groaned as the sunlight blinded him and he took his first breath of fresh air in three weeks.

He had been bedridden the entire time after the raid and it drove him nuts just sitting there waiting for his body to become unzombiefied. Hunts Alone had gotten out with a clean bill of health a couple days after Mark woke up and she visited him when she had some free time, but those were few and far in between during the lonely weeks. He looked forward to her visits, but it was awkward the first couple of time because neither of theme knew where to start after all that happened.

He was finally allowed to leave the tent after his body semi-returned to normal and Hunts Alone happily carried him outside in her cleavage. Mark looked around to see the village back to normal, but some the villagers were gawking back at him. He hid himself deeper inside Hunts' cleavage to avoid the piercing stares.

The Wise-Woman had announced his existence to the rest of villagers shortly after everything calmed and somehow explained his so-called heroic feats to them. The villagers were shocked at first, then curiosity took over as many them rushed to see him but the Wise-Woman stopped them in their tracks. "Marksman is healing from his injuries, so nobody is to interrupt his recuperation except for Hunts Alone, since she's the one that found him." She announced, earning some whines from the villagers but none of them defied the order. The Wise-Woman's word is law.

So Mark now felt incredible shy at all the attention he was getting.

"Hey Hunts." he called out.
"What is it?" she replied.
"Do you think that we could go out to the plains for awhile?" Mark asked, fidgeting in her expansive cleavage.
"Sure. But why do you want to go now?"
"Those stares are killing me." He wasn't exaggerating as every Amazon was staring at his tiny figure hidden within Hunts' cleavage. He wasn't use to so much attention and some the of stares held more than just curiosity.

Hunts agreed and she strolled out the village, leaving the curious stares behind. She started running across the plains and left the village behind. Mark went through another roller-coaster ride of heaving tits as Hunts' breast fought to escape from her breastband. 10 minutes later, Mark laid down feeling sicker than he did in the tent and was trying to avoid heaving on Hunts' chest.

Swallowing his bile, Mark crawled out of her cleavage and Hunts carefully picked him up. She found a boulder to sit on and lowered Mark down onto the rocky surface. Mark heaved a sigh of relief now that he's away from all of the villagers. He was starting to wish that he didn't go on a portal rampage but no use crying over spilt milk. His ability to create portals had shocked and awed everybody, but everybody could've turned on him for such an ability. There have been many cases before in history of people rioting against the unknown.

"Marksman." Hunts called him out of his thoughts.
"Yeah."
"Do you think that you could......I don't know....ss-show me your.......g-gift." She stuttered shyly.
"Ah." You and Hunts Alone had avoided the subject during her visits and the Wise-Woman had banned him from using while he recuperated.

"Sure. I can't do anything like I did before, but a small demonstration shouldn't hurt." Hunts' face beamed and Mark looked for something to use to show off the portal device. He looked down at the boulder they were sitting on and he gestured for Hunts to get up. She complied, with Mark placed on her shoulder and he told her to stand back.

She took a few steps back, "Watch this." he said then Mark opened a portal underneath the giant boulder. Hunts Alone's jaw dropped when the portal swallowed the boulder whole and another portal spat it out 20 feet away. Hunts Alone stared at the boulder then at Mark.

"What else can you do?" she asked excitedly, her earlier shyness seeming like an illusion. She fired a barrage of question about what he can do and he couldn't keep up with the endless questions. Mark held up his hands to ward off the barrage and said, "Hunts. I can't answer everything, but how about I show you with your own eyes."

She nodded ecstatically, her dark hair flying everywhere. Mark laughed, then used the previous boulder to show off his abilities. He made the boulder disappear only to reappear high in the air and fall the earth. He had half the boulder disappear into the portal while the other half appeared in front of Hunts. He then made loop, making the boulder fall from one portal above to another one below and the boulder fell into an endless loop. Hunts was reluctant to stick her hand in the portal, but Mark's reassurance helped her stick her hand in. She watched flabbergasted as her own hand disappear and reappear in midair in front of her. She even shook it with her other hand and laughed when she stuck other limbs into the portal. Mark had her hold out her other hand before he dropped the heavy boulder onto it. Hunts screamed but went wide-eyed when the boulder shrunk upon exiting the portal and landed in her hand. She tossed it up in the air, not believing the heavy rock was now a mere pebble in the palm of her hand.

Mark returned the boulder to its proper place and size, feeling tired from using the device so much but feeling it was worth it. He suddenly thought of a game that they could play and he grinned with slyly.

"Hey Hunts."
"What?"
"Are you up for a game?"
"What game could we possibly play with your size?"

Mark glowered at that last remark, but put on a fake grin and said, "It's a game even I can play." Hunts gave a skeptical look, but you ignored it and said, "Hide and Seek."

Her eyebrows shot up into her hair, but she grinned in turn and said, "You're lousy at that game."
Mark gaped, "No I'm not!" he defended."
"Yes, you are because I found you easily when we first met." Hunts Alone puffed out her chest, rocking Mark off her shoulder and rolling into her cleavage. She giggled and pulled you out. "That doesn't cut. I was distracted and you came up behind."

She went tsk tsk and said, "A hunter always knows what's going on around them and that is no excuse for getting caught." She quoted smugly.

"Then this shouldn't be a challenge for you then." Mark challenged. He tried to not break out grinning as he knew how to use the portal device in his hand now.
"Fine. How about we make a wager then Marksman."
"Alright. What the wager?"
"The loser has to do "ANYTHING" the winner says for one day."
"DEAL!!!!" Mark shouted.
"Buuuuttttt," she drawled, "You can't use your gift."

Hunts Alone grinned when Mark realized his mistake and she set him down in the grass gently.

"I'll be it then. It will be your victory if I can't find you in an hour, but it will be my victory if I find you."

Mark nodded and Hunts Alone walked a few paces away then started counting down.

What do you do.

142.content:
World background:

In the year 2150, a viral infection broke out across the world that cause 85% of the male population to rapidly shrink to near microscopic size. Professor Connor Maxwell, a genius in the field of genetic engineering managed to synthesize a cure before his untimely shrink that managed to save the remaining males from the virus. Though his efforts saved the human race from a near extinction event, a new power emerged from the power vacuum left behind by the virus.

Women became that dominant sex on the planet, new laws were immediately implemented. As the female sex gained power, males in turn lost their status, becoming nothing more than breeding stock as their numbers barely reached 10% of their original population. Another unfortunate side effect of the virus was that the males would become sterile after reaching the age of 25, making them a hot commodity before their coming of age but became useless afterwards and treated as slaves. Any male below the age of 25 on the street would be captured then auctioned off to the highest bidder.

As for the shrunken males, a few curious scientist searched for them but only a few were ever found alive and most assumed they died off, so they were thus forgotten.

Except they managed to survive and thrive. Unbeknownst to the world, an advanced, microscopic alien race had been living on Earth for millennia, colonizing compatible human host for resources and when the male population unexpectedly shrank, the aliens quickly integrated them into their civilization. Their technology was 200 years more advanced than even the top of the line equipment produced by the military.

The aliens though, began to die off as human disease carried by the males caused an epidemic that destroyed their civilization. When the last of the benevolent aliens passed away, the males became the sole inheritors of their technology and ideology, so they decided to complete their benefactor's goal of colonizing habitable planets, beginning with what was once their own.

Thus they began to work in the shadows, turning average humans into habitable colonies and using them to help achieve their goal of intergalactic travel by nudging them into the right direction. They were no longer human but not alien either, something below the view of their gigantic counterparts.

Thus they called themselves Subhumans.
142.title: The World of Subhumans

15.content:
Here you or your character can have some fun within a society that indulges itself with portal-related activities.

Because of the high price of the portal device itself, Middle-man services for portals have grown in demand as more people have started using receivers. Portal devices are often leased or rented out to businesses and normal folk who can't afford to outright purchase one.

Business-grade portal devices can be connected to portal-compatible computer servers, and they're commonly networked with fee-based kiosk PCs that will let you access a restricted version of the device. The administrators can set rules for the device used by customers to prevent accidents or misuse. The most common rules involve limiting the portals based on money paid, and forcing the portal entrance to be created near the computer that accessed it.

There are a lot of businesses that make use of portals as a source of entertainment.

Many cyber cafes now include a section for portal computer renting. They include receivers and access to an in-house portal device through the network. This is where most people go to shrink over the internet. (For more information on websites, please see "Websites & The Internet" )

For those that are just looking to get shrunk, there are places that will allow the use of a portal to create an exit in the same room. Customers can optionally pay a fee to be delivered to their desired address. For a premium fee there are first-class package delivery services that will gently deliver the customer to the desired location. These are fully furnished air-conditioned package, equipped with food and entertainment.

Most popular with families are fairs, theme parks, & water parks that use portals. Usually entire parks are shrunken-only, but there are some mixed parks that have a section for shrunken people and a section for normal-sized. A few parks are mixed and have rides aimed at a normal and a tiny riding together.

While tiny they can visit normal-sized aquariums, zoos, safaris; they can visit tiny attractions, ride small trains around the park, see some giant street performances. The areas are meticulously cleaned of insects and dangerous chemicals, and most normal-sized people are usually forbidden. Tiny crowds can be taken on a tour with a normal-sized tour guide.

A human body exploration attraction is in the works but no parks have implemented one yet, fearing it may be too visceral for most families.

Although controversial, some parents shrink their children so that they're easier to manage. This is useful for when a caretaker or babysitter have to watch a difficult child or a rebellious young teen. Sometimes the babysitter agrees to be shrunk if the parents don't entirely trust them, as is usually the case with male babysitters. There are also tutoring services parents use for home-schooled kids, where they teleport their children/teens to the tutors house for the day.

There are daycares & kindergartens that require the students to be shrunk for easier management during school hours. Some upper-grade schools have a mix of shrunken and normal sized students; usually the shrunken are attending from beyond the range of bus transport. Teachers and staff always remain normal sized, but some controversial feminist schools & colleges force all girls to remain normal sized and all boys to be shrunk, this includes male teachers.

Some schools only shrink for punishment: If students get continuously bad grades or break the rules, schools can punish them with forced shrinking instead of detention. Shrunken alleged delinquents/bullies aren't given any staff help traversing the school. They are expected to "make friends" so that they can have a normal person take them from class to class.

Some use portals simply to travel quickly due to same-size portals not being available yet. Some people use them just to get to work quickly, growing themselves back using another portal near or within their neighborhood. There are vacation services that allow you to teleport to a receiver over the internet and enjoy a vacation immediately.

Using a portal to regain normal size immediately after teleporting thousands of miles is risky: It can have some negatives side-effects such as being stuck at a small size for a long period of time. It's recommended to wait at least 24 hours after a cross-continent teleport, sometimes a few days depending on the distance.

Because vacationers have to stay shrunk for the first day or two of their journey, vacation teleportation hotels cost a premium to ensure the safety and comfort of newly teleported customers. Many travelers get around these high prices by finding unlicensed hostesses on social networks that promise to take the vacationers into their own home for a much more affordable rate. However, this is high-risk and great care should be taken in selecting a hostess.

Shrunken restaurants have sprung up for those that want to have a unique dining experience. Some involve shrinking their patrons while keeping the staff at a normal size. This is especially popular with restaurants that staff young, attractive waitresses for their sex appeal.

There are a few exotic restaurants that allow shrunken patrons to eat their meal off of a selected nude model or volunteer, with volunteers usually being friends with the patrons. Some all-you-can-eat buffets pit shrunken people against normal-sized for their food eating contests.

Commonly used within shrunken sports restaurants are shrunken bars. These are popular for people that are interested in picking up someone who's interested in size-play. Many men and women will shrink themselves here before trying to get lucky with a bartender, a waitress/waiter, or a customer who's into size play.

There are nightclubs that offer the shrinking of attendees. Concerts will often have the patrons shrunken on a stage while a skimpy-clothed or nude singer performs above and around them. Wild raves will have a section of the floor partitioned off for shrunken patrons; it's often said that being tiny amplifies the experience. Some require all men to be shrunk, with shrunk women allowed in the mix.

Many strip clubs have special rooms where customers can pay to be shrunken down for a lap dance, other clubs require a mandatory shrinking before they can even see the dancers. With the mandatory shrink clubs the girls are allowed to be a lot more kinky with their shows. It's not uncommon for solo or lesbian porn to be performed live on stage. A few clubs have started a tradition of accepting picking lucky volunteers from the audience to be included in their shows. For women there are male strip-clubs, many with shrunken males as strippers.

There are also brothels, call-girls, and plenty of "massage parlors" that offer services to shrunken people, with some providing their own shrinking service. Some massage parlors will offer to use a shrunken client to massage a nude models body, or sometimes a normal-sized clients body.

Finally, most public places allow for mixed-sizes, even if they themselves don't provide any size changing services themselves. Some examples are public beaches, parks, grocery stores, movie theaters etc.


So, what theme best fits your scenario?

1512.content:
Mark sat in a private room of a cyber cafe, the dark room illuminated only by his Laptop monitor, on the screen, a live stream of the stream girl 'Londeia'. "...And remember! The donators who sent a picture of themselves and have access to their own Portal Device by five today get a chance to play some games with me in person! That's just 5 minutes from now so get your last minute donations in!" the stream girl says in her usual, cheerful voice.

She was finishing the stream's last match of Overwatch but Mark never really tuned in for that, he tuned in for the live video of her taking up at least a quarter of the screen of her wearing a tight tank top, showing off her ample cleavage to the viewers.

"Okay everyone, time's up! Let's find out who our lucky winners are." she joyfully announces before tapping something into her keyboard, Mark had already donated and sent a picture of himself, he had rented the room he currently sat in purely in the hope of winning the competition "And here are our winners! congrats guys!" the four winners names were displayed on screen, Mark almost jumped in joy at seeing his own name there, alongside the other three winners.

"Winners, check your Emails for information about how to connect to my Receiver, please come immediately!" she blows an exaggerated kiss to the camera "Mwah! We'll be back shortly, stay tuned everyone!" the stream closes, leaving only the names of the winners on screen.

Mark checks his Emails to find a new message in his inbox with the information on how to connect, he connects the Portal Device to his Laptop and enters in the connection information, the private Receiver's information is displayed on screen after a few moments of waiting.

Londeia's Donation Winners here!

Filters: Portal Devices, Electronic Devices.

Description: Donation winners only! TRESPASSERS WILL BE SQUISHED!!!

This is it, finally he was going to meet his dream girl, sure he will be tiny, but this was a chance he couldn't give up.

After a few moments the display a message confirming the connection, the device emits a low ping before suddenly opening a portal right before Mark's eyes, he takes a deep breath and steps through the portal..

...

Immediately after stepping through the portal Mark falls and lands roughly on a hard wooden surface, apparently the receiver was suspended above the ground, after regaining his footing he begins to take in his surroundings, vast pink walls expand into the sky all around him, each one seemingly miles away, to his left the wooden surface he stood on ends and leads to a long drop, to his right, a black sloping surface with square blocks jutting out of it.

Forwards across the expansive wooden surface he could see the other three donation winners, They turn to face him as he approaches but before he could greet them, a booming voice diverts the attention of all of the tiny fans.

"At LAST the final winner arrives!" the unmistakably familiar voice says, Mark turns his head towards the source of the voice to see a tower of white fabric hugging tightly around an all too familiar chasm of pale milky skin, blond hair cascades around the mountainous cleavage and frames the giddy face of Londeia which peers down at him.

"We need to get you guys ready quick, my view count is dropping by the minute!" Londeia leans forwards, bringing her face so that she was eye level with the tiny donators.

"Here's how this is going to go; we're going to ask the stream what they want to see us all play, we'll make it a competition so that this stays interesting" Londeia gives a sly grin "...Of course, none of you could hope to beat me, not at your tiny size, so we'll let the stream decide on how I punish the biggest little loser"

"P-punished?!" the female donator asks, clearly unnerved at this revelation, Londeia smiles at the smaller girl's reaction "Yep! I can't wait to see what they suggest, they can get really creative" the stream girl snickers.

Another donator steps forwards and speaks up to Londeia in a shaky voice "Uh.. What kind of punishments will the loser suffer?" Londeia hums to herself, pondering "Well... Create or follow a scenario based on Schools, Colleges, Home, Babysitting. Re-posted for your convenience:

Although controversial, some parents shrink their children so that they're easier to manage. This is useful for when a caretaker or babysitter have to watch a difficult child or a rebellious young teen. Sometimes the babysitter agrees to be shrunk if the parents don't entirely trust them, as is usually the case with male babysitters. There are also tutoring services parents use for home-schooled kids, where they teleport their children/teens to the tutors house for the day.

There are daycares & kindergartens that require the students to be shrunk for easier management during school hours. Some upper-grade schools have a mix of shrunken and normal sized students; usually the shrunken are attending from beyond the range of bus transport. Teachers and staff always remain normal sized, but some controversial feminist schools & colleges force all girls to remain normal sized and all boys to be shrunk, this includes male teachers.

Some schools only shrink for punishment: If students get continuously bad grades or break the rules, schools can punish them with forced shrinking instead of detention. Shrunken alleged delinquents/bullies aren't given any staff help traversing the school. They are expected to "make friends" so that they can have a normal person take them from class to class.

1521.content:
Sally, a 8-years old, and her little toddler brother Gary form together a happy family with their single mother Samantha. However, as it is often the case with single-parent family, money didn’t flow as water, to say the less.

Going from one casual works to the other, Samantha had difficulty to make ends meet. She was eventually forced to move out into an even smaller apartment, with no bedroom at all. You can imagine how tough it is to raise a family in such an overcrowded place. Sally had to suffer the tears of her toddler brother who slept right next to her. And the mother, snowed under, worked hard to synchronize their paces of life, to no avail.

She was on the verge of depression when she found about a new portal brand, named “one more room”, who offered to shrink things to store it more easily. In a first time, she didn’t see in what it could be useful in her situation, since she didn’t own a lot of furniture, until she read on the prospectus that, for “female” owner who wanted extra safety and availability at all times for their precious goods (portals have limited range), they had designed a special “womb room” device, which allowed to put things into the safest place imaginable. They also added that it would work as a pessary in parallel, giving it two uses at the same price.
She found it odd in a first time, but after a closer reading, it looks like the device shrinks and decontaminates simultaneously the transferred objects to avoid any risk of disease or dirt in such a vulnerable place. There would be no problems for her health. However, it was indicated nowhere that the device was designed for living objects… like her children she was considering “storing “that way.

She was uncertain in a first time, but after a few more exhausting days in her crowded flat, she thought it was worth giving a try.
She drew on her savings to buy an affordable portal and decided to test it the very week.

Sally and Gary were horsing around again as she went home. “Stop stealing my pencils, we have very few” Sally shouted to her young brother who was still learning to talk. As every child, he was curious of what his sibling was doing and wanted to copy her, whereas his sister was not very sharing.

“Shut up, you two” Sam interrupts them. The two siblings freeze on the spot, startled by how loud their mother had talked, and stare at her in awe for a moment. Samantha didn’t yell often, so they know it was for serious topics when she did.
Sam takes a deep breath, and begins to explain things to her older child. “Sally, I know it hasn’t been easy for you since we moved in there, and I suppose you lack very much of privacy. If I told you there is one chance to give you some, would you accept whatever the conditions”.

A wide smile grew on Sally’s face at the perspective. “Really, a true new bedroom like in the good old days ... neat!!” she clapped in joy. Then she thinks a while and say “but are we going to move again?”

Sam knows she is stepping on the touchy matter to introduce. “Well, maybe “new” is not the accurate word… I’d rather say it is a very old one, the very first you occupied in your whole life. I’m suggesting you to go back in but, at a different scale….”

Sally looks at her perplexed. Sam doubts to be very clear in her explanation. So, she decides to tell it straight. “Ok, to be honest, I’m offering you to go into my womb”.
“What?” exclaimed the dumbfounded child. “Like a baby?”.
“No sweetie. You are not going to be cramped in there. I can adjust size so it looks spacious for you”, she reassures her. “Listen, I’ve already tested it on vegetables, and none got damaged in the process. It’s totally harmless. It’s going to be like a real room for you, but with fleshy floor and walls. Do you agree with that ?”

Samantha didn’t want to force her children. Things would go easier if they consented to it by themselves.

Sally was doubtful. It was not like any room she had seen before. It was her mother’s body, her womb. Well, technically, she had already been in there, but she didn’t remember anything, and it was not going to be the same as a shrunk person than as a fetus waiting to be born. However, she could accept anything to get away from her brother bothering her all the time, like he was currently doing right then.

“Heh, I suppose it’s worth giving it a try.” She says with a fake smile, while pushing back restless little Gary.

Samantha returns her smile, and gets the device out of her pocket. It was a small gun, designed to shoot the portals directly on walls. She fires it on the one place she had purposely cleaned for that, making appear a blue oval at the size of a door.

“See, this is the door of normal sized world side. It is connected to the other micro end that I have pushed against my cervix, which automatically set itself on the inner part, within my womb. It wasn’t very pleasant, but well, anyway, there is the gate to my womb”. Samantha hands a walkie-talkie and a flashlight to her daughter. “I want you to always keep those close to you.”
“Don’t tell me I’m gonna get lost in there” asked a bit uneasy Sally.
“No, don’t worry. I just prefer… to stay in contact the time you’re in, okay. Just basic safety.”

Of course, Samantha couldn’t tell her that despite the tests on the vegetables, she had no idea how the device would handle a complex human being. In a first time, the talkie was there to make sure she would be fine once on the other side. Sam should have done more experiments, with animals for example, but she couldn’t afford it. She simply trusted the device to work correctly, and keep her child intact.

Sally stands a while in front of the captivating glowing entrance, which evokes a bit the stargate. She didn’t know how things would be on the other side, but, after all, it could not be worse than the current situation. And more than anything else, she trusted deeply her mother to keep her safe.

“Okay, well, here we go” Sally said, taking her courage in both hands, as she stepped eyes closed in the blue oval.

On her side of the story, the whole gravity changed in the room, making her suddenly fall on the previously wall which has become the floor. And vice-versa as Samantha got up quickly to pick the talkie. It’s not that it was painful, but Sally didn’t like to be tossed around like a toy.

“Mom, stop moving around like this”.
“What? did I hurt you ?”
“No, but it’s very unpleasant to have the top of my room changing direction all the time.”

Apparently, the orientation of the womb for Sally depended of Sam’s own body position.

“Maybe you shouldn’t stay in there while I’m doing my daily routine, sweetie. You’ll go back tonight”

“But Mooooom…”. Sally was really fond of her new bedroom. Things were going better than Sam expected.

She settled on a compromise: “Listen, I’m going to bottle-feed your brother in the sofa, so you have a moment of stillness. Hold on while I sit down”.

Sam takes little Gary, fill his bottle and sit in comfortably to feed him, focusing on her daughter’s movement at the same time. It was a bare tickle as she moved in there; she feels relieved that the sensitive nerves end on the other side of the cervix.

From Sally’s point of view, the room now looked like a little slope, allowing her to explore deeper the other end of the womb. However, disappointingly, the floor and walls didn’t look any different than at the entrance. She was starting to get bored until she noticed something. Far on the opposite side of the womb, she could see two tunnels going somewhere deeper in her mom, one starting on each of the right and left “corners”, to say so.

Disconcert, ignorant as she is of female anatomy, she picks her talkie to ask directly to her mother.
“Mom, what are those two tunnels for?”
“What are you talking about?”
“Well, it looks like there are two corridors in the back of your womb, going further in your body. They are way smaller than the whole place.”

Samantha took a while to recollect her old memories of high school, until she remembered the whole part about ovaries and fallopian tubes. She immediately called back her daughter to stop her as she was getting closer to the appealing tunnel.

“Don’t go in there. It’s dangerous!!”
“Why?”
“It’s just that…” Sam hesitated for a moment, but her daughter was definitely too young for a reproduction system lesson. She didn’t want to give her bad ideas. “That is a private place. You know, like attics. It’s forbidden”
“I already went in one, in out last home, and it wasn’t that bad”.
Bad disobedient girl, even more curious than a kit. Sam had troubles with the setting of limits since she was born.

“Listen Sally, if you ever go there, I swear I will take back the access to this special bedroom. You’ll lose everything as fast as you got it. So think well before disobeying this time. And don’t imagine you could sneak around; I can feel your every movements inside me”. Of course, Sam was lying through her teeth: she could barely feel her daughter moving. Sally could probably avoid her vigilance by going slow enough, but Sam needed to make her believe she was the one in control.

It looks like it work meanwhile: of course, if her mother threatened to take back her wonderful bedroom, Sally felt that she could probably make an effort, and ignore this part.

She finished the tour of the womb, and relaxed for a while, enjoying the super soft material, stretching around her four members to touch the most around her. Even empty, it was going to be the best bedroom on the world.

As she eventually finished feeding her son, making him burp and everything, she carefully stands up. Sally gently slides to the bottom once again, still upset with this gravity problem, but knowing she could do little about it. The radio crackles once again “Ok, now, it’s not a good thing to cloister yourself in your bedroom. Get out or I’ll take you out myself.
